WorkItem.Description:
I am unable to filter for items that require multiple items.
The problem is I can only filter for one string.
As it reads for item number 48165 (Malfurion's Trousers of Triumph): The users source is reported as "Purchasable with 75 [Emblem of Triumph] and 1 [Trophy of the Crusade]". This can be filtered with no problems. Unfortunately the actual data being filtered seems to be reported as two separate strings and reads as fallows:
 
Purchasable with 75 [Emblem of Triumph]
Purchasable with 1 [Trophy of the Crusade]
 
Any filter I apply only reflects one string or the other, with no way to filter them together.
 
Either the String needs to be one string to filter it easier, or I need to know how to filter for two strings.

Comments.Message: If someone is working on this or has found a way to work around it, please let me know.

Still an issue in v2.3.5

Same issue
